SELECT COUNT (*) AS CNT FROM COURSE C INNER JOIN BOARD_COURSE BC ON C.COURSE_NO=BC.COURSE_NO INNER JOIN BULLETIN_BOARD BB ON BC.POST_NO=BB.POST_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON BB.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*)AS CNT,POST_NO FROM GOOD GROUP BY POST_NO) G ON BB.POST_NO= G.POST_NO WHERE BLTNBOARD_NO=1 AND BB.DEL_DT IS NULL
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND CONTENTS LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt}||'%'
AND NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt} ||'%'
AND BC.COURSE_NO LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt} ||'%'

SELECT POST_NO,COURSE_NO,COURSE_NM,BLTNBOARD_NO,MEMBER_NO,TITLE,CONTENTS,B_IMG,HIT,DT,RNUM,GOOD,NM,CNT,DEL_DT,GRNK FROM (SELECT F.POST_NO,F.COURSE_NO,F.COURSE_NM,F.BLTNBOARD_NO,F.MEMBER_NO,F.TITLE,F.CONTENTS,F.B_IMG,F.HIT,F.DT,F.RNUM,F.GOOD,F.NM,F.CNT,F.DEL_DT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MM ORDER BY GOOD DESC)AS GRNK ,MM FROM(SELECT BC.POST_NO,BC.COURSE_NO,C.COURSE_NM,BB.BLTNBOARD_NO,M.MEMBER_NO,BB.TITLE,BB.CONTENTS,BB.IMG_FILE AS B_IMG,BB.HIT,M.NM, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(BB.REG_DT, 'YY.MM.DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY.MM.DD') THEN TO_CHAR(BB.REG_DT, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(BB.REG_DT,'YY.MM.DD') END AS DT, TO_CHAR(BB.REG_DT,'YY.MM')AS MM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BB.POST_NO DESC) AS RNUM, NVL(CNT,0)AS GOOD,NVL(CCNT,0)AS CNT,BB.DEL_DT FROM COURSE C INNER JOIN BOARD_COURSE BC ON C.COURSE_NO=BC.COURSE_NO INNER JOIN BULLETIN_BOARD BB ON BC.POST_NO=BB.POST_NO AND TO_CHAR(BB.REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM') = '2022.08' INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON BB.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*)AS CNT,POST_NO FROM GOOD GROUP BY POST_NO) G ON BB.POST_NO= G.POST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*)AS CCNT,POST_NO FROM COMMENTS WHERE DEL_DT IS NULL GROUP BY POST_NO) CC ON BB.POST_NO=CC.POST_NO WHERE BLTNBOARD_NO=1 AND BB.DEL_DT IS NULL
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND CONTENTS LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt}||'%'
AND NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt} ||'%'
AND BC.COURSE_NO LIKE '%'|| #{searchTxt} ||'%'
)F) WHERE GRNK BETWEEN 1 AND 8
